outputs.output_descr:
1.   Enhance the capacity of the selected micro and small entrepreneurs/producers in the target aimags to be engaged in income-generating activities and/or start their own businesses
2.  Improve the quality of locally available business support services through the chamber network
3.  Improve the local coordination among existing business development/support services in the target aimags

project_descr: Joint Programme on Comprehensive Community Services to Improve Human Security for the Rural Disadvantaged Populations in Mongolia
project_title: Community Services to improve Human Security
